title: 130: Bachelor Recap: Finale Part 2 (Peace Out, Pete & Hannah Ann Stans)
itunes:title: 130: Bachelor Recap: Finale Part 2 (Peace Out, Pete & Hannah Ann Stans)
description:
When ABC said this was going to be the most dramatic finale - this time they were telling us the truth, Broads! The Broads chat ALL the ups and downs (mostly downs) of this final episode! It’s been a wild ride - thank YOU for joining us #broadsquad.
Make sure to tune in and join us as we start our LOVE IS BLIND recaps starting NEXT WEEK!
